column15: SP notifies as soon as reasonably practicable following discovery
column16: SP notifies as soon as reasonably practicable and without unreasonable delay if PI is likely to be misused
column17: SP notifies as soon as practicable and without unreasonable delay if PI is believed to be acquired by an unauthorized person
column18: SP notifies as soon as practicable if the SP has not entered into a contract with those people whose data has been breached
column20: SP notifies as soon as possible
column21: SP notifies immediately after discovery if PI is reasonably believed to be acquired by an unauthorized person
column22: SP notifies immediately after discovery if misuse of PI is likely to occur
column23: SP notifies immediately after discovery if PI was included in the breached data
column24: SP notifies immediately after discovery consistent with the legitimate needs of law enforcement
column25: SP notifies immediately after discovery either based on the prior conditions or in any circumstance
column26: SP notifies in the most expedient time possible no later than 45 calendar days after discovery
column27: SP notifies in an expeditious manner if acquisition by an unauthorized person occurred and is reasonably believed to cause a material risk of identity theft or fraud
column28: SP notifies in the most expedient time possible after discovery
column29: SP notifies immediately after determination or reasonable belief that information has been breached
